thread.title: Spiers Hotel. Stellenbosch
thread.title_full: Spiers Hotel. Stellenbosch - Review of Spier Hotel, Stellenbosch, South Africa - TripAdvisor

author: 646raymondw
title: Spiers Hotel. Stellenbosch
text: First class spacious hotel resort. Very tasteful with lots of local art work ( sculptures and paintings)l. Great staff and wine. Beautiful gardens to stroll through. It even has a small river meandering through the grounds. Very different to most hotels we stay at. Very relaxing.
